page.title: 15STH WINGFIELD LOCAL ARTIST
page.content: {Mr. Barry Renshaw who lives in South {Wingfield is well-known in the area {for his paintings of Derbyshire.} Mr. Renshaw came to live in the village when he was 15 years old in order to work at the pit (which has now closed). He began sketching and painting 17 years ago as a hobby and now his oil paintings have sold all over the world. He has a gallery/shop in nearby Alfreton and each year produces a popular calendar of prints from his paintings of Derbyshire. Mr.Renshaw is a member of the 'Wayfarers' folk group who organise a local folk festival, regularly work for B.B.C. radio and have toured Germany. They have just released their seventh record album.
